meanings.sent1: The combustion of the wood created warmth in the room.
meanings.sent2: Firefighters quickly extinguished the combustion in the building.
meanings.sent3: The combustion of the birthday candles set off the smoke alarm!
meanings.sent4: The combustion of anger in his eyes was evident to everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The combustion of the rocket engine was a sight to behold.

meanings.sent1: The combustion of fuel in the engine powers the car.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the combustion of different substances in labs.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected combustion of the experiment caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: The combustion of emotions in her heart was overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The controlled combustion of the fireworks lit up the night sky.
